qas.question: What is the first stage of Jewish marriage?
Which angel announced to Mary that she was to be the mother of the Messiah?
What did Joseph plan to do when told of Mary's coneption in a dream?
Where did Mary live when she was visited by the angel Gabriel?
In his dream, who told Joseph about Mary's conception?
What is the last stage of Jewish marriage?
What angel did Joseph meet before he had the dream?
Where did Joseph live when he was visited by the angel Gabriel?

context: Mary resided in "her own house"[Lk.1:56] <a3_0>in <b7_0><b8_0><b9_0>Nazareth in Galilee<b9_0/><b8_0/><b7_0/><a3_0/>, possibly with her parents, and during her <a0_0><b5_0>betrothal<b5_0/><a0_0/> — the first stage of a Jewish marriage — the angel <a1_0><b6_0>Gabriel<b6_0/><a1_0/> announced to her that she was to be the mother of the promised Messiah by conceiving him through the Holy Spirit, and she responded, "I am the handmaid of the Lord. Let it be done unto me according to your word." After a number of months, when Joseph was told of her conception in a dream by "<a4_0>an angel of the Lord<a4_0/>", he planned to <a2_0>divorce her<a2_0/>; but the angel told him to not hesitate to take her as his wife, which Joseph did, thereby formally completing the wedding rites.[Mt 1:18-25]
